name: vechain-dapp-kit
description: A TypeScript library that facilitates seamless interaction between vechain wallets (veworld, sync2) and dApps.

scripts.clean: rm -rf .turbo .parcel-cache .reports build && npx turbo@latest run clean
scripts.purge: npx turbo@latest run purge && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.reinstall: yarn clean && yarn purge && yarn && yarn run build:deps
scripts.stop-preview: kill -2 $(ps aux | grep '[t]urbo run preview' | awk '{print $2}')
scripts.test:e2e: turbo run preview > /dev/null 2>&1 & turbo run test:e2e; yarn stop-preview
scripts.test:e2e:ci: turbo run preview & turbo run test:e2e:headless
scripts.test:e2e:headless: turbo run preview > /dev/null 2>&1 & turbo run test:e2e:headless; yarn stop-preview
